column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " That sport is a mockery of the noble tradition of bending . "
#Text=You 're here to finish your Avatar training .
#Text=So , for the time being , I want you to remain on the island .
#Text=" Korra says : " Is that why you 're keeping the White Lotus sentries around , to watch my every move ?
#Text=In order to learn airbending I believe you require a calm , quiet environment , free from any distractions .
#Text=" Korra says : " All right , you 're the master .
